description: Try our easy to follow Healthier Sausage Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage rolls,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Mince,Picnic,Peanut free
name: Healthier Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Combine mince, carrot, zucchini, 1/2 tub tomato paste, parsley, paprika and cheese in a large bowl. Season with pepper. Place a double layer of filo pastry on baking paper, and spread 1/4 of mince mixture along the short edge. Spray with oil and roll up into a log. Repeat with remaining filo pastry and mince.
Cut logs into small pieces, about 3cm each. Place on prepared tray and spray tops lightly with oil. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden and cooked through.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute. Add remaining tomato paste and cook, stirring, for 1 minute. Add 1/4 cup water and remaining parsley and stir to combine. Season with pepper and serve with sausage rolls and salad.
